title: and Nicotine Inhaling Products) Act 2023 (No. 35 of 2023), hereby make the
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Public Health (Tobacco
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Public Health (Tobacco 

Products and Nicotine Inhaling Products) Act 2023 (Fees) Regulations 2024. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 2nd day of February

title: and Nicotine Inhaling Products) Act 2023 (No. 35 of 2023), hereby make the
heading: 7. The amount of €1800 is prescribed as the fee payable to the Executive
text_raw:
7. The amount of €1800 is prescribed as the fee payable to the Executive 
for the purposes of an application for renewal of a licence to sell tobacco 
products and nicotine inhaling products. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd January, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [736] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

17 December, 2024. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health.

title: and Nicotine Inhaling Products) Act 2023 (No. 35 of 2023), hereby make the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations set out the fees to be paid to the National Environmental 
Health Service of the Health Service Executive in respect of matters under Part 
2 of the Public Health (Tobacco Products and Nicotine Inhaling Products) Act
text_norm: explanatory note (this note part instrument purport legal interpretation.) regulation set fee paid national environmental health service health service executive respect matter part 2 public health (tobacco product nicotine inhaling products) act
